Class CommandLine

extends java.lang.Object
    This class gives the command line interface for user Every user input is retrieved and navigated to functionality

        public boolean checkArmiesPlaced()
        This method is used for checking if place all command need to perform or not
        Returns:

      • checkPlayersTurn

        public boolean checkPlayersTurn​(java.lang.String countryName)
        This method is used for checking the player's turn or not
        Parameters:
        countryName - this variable contains the name of the country
        Returns:
        this returns true when matches with current player; Otherwise false

      • executeBehaviour

        This Method determines the behaviour of a player and perform its moves

        Returns:
        success if strategy executed successfully
